Title: Attention Is All You Need

Authors:
  1. Ashish Vaswani
  2. Noam Shazeer
  3. Niki Parmar

Key Finding: The paper proposes a new simple network architecture, the Transformer, based solely on attention mechanisms, dispensing with recurrence and convolutions entirely, which achieves superior results on machine translation tasks while being more parallelizable and requiring significantly less time to train.
